channel.description: ok first i need to figure out how to add in no clip and second how can i make a staff island and third i want hail but i cant figure it out if you can help out with any i would love you (no homo)

item.title: Need Help with coding(im a noob)
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

StaffZone

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffisland") && (playerRights >= 1)) { triggerTele(x, y, 0); sM("The Staff Island."); }

*note - change it to suit your client.

Hail

if(command.startsWith("hail") && playerRights > 2){ hail(); } -Add that in your commands-

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public void hail()
{
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
client person = (client)p;
if(p != null && person.distanceToPoint(absX, absY) <= 5) {
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.plrText = “Insert Text here.”;
castOn.plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
castOn.TurnPlayerTo(absX, absY);
castOn.setAnimation(1651);
castOn.updateRequired = true;
castOn.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}
}
